column4: is there any way to make ubuntu automatically log in to an account and totally bypass the logon screen? I've got a box that I'm setting up as a pvr and I want to vnc in to it, which I can do, but right now I have to hook up to it, log in, and THEN I can vnc.
thanks I should have seen that before
System-Administration-Login Window. You can set autologin on one of the tabs.
